name: Quantum Qitty
description:
a small game about an unstable  qitty who can quantum dash through solid matter! 

watch out for the orb of anticatter that quantum dashing creates.

made in 72 hours for LD49

theme: Unstable

Controls:

WASD / KEYS - Movement

SPACE / Z - Jump

J / X - Quantum Dash 

@ms_frogrammer - Coding/Level Design

@freerdan - Art/Design

@JamphibiousFM - Music/SFX
